subject: Re: [junit] How to handle Exception?
msgSnippet: ... What s the issue? It is impossible to both throw an exception and return a value from the same method. Do one or the other. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
messageBody:
Anil Devrao J wrote:

> In above method whenever exception occurs its coming to the catch block of
> testmethod and its not returning false which is expected and because of that
> test method is failing.
>
> Could you please help me in this issue?

What's the issue? It is impossible to both throw an exception and return
a value from the same method. Do one or the other.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
